overview: Angel Rivera makes his CockyBoys exclusive debut in the poignant short, “Lips Together – Six Feet Apart” written and directed by Jake Jaxson & RJ Sebastian. Joined by Exclusive Sean Ford, Lips Together showcases the sweet longing that occurs when one is made to be apart from someone they love. Blake Mitchell, Nico Leon, Brock Banks & Sharok fill out the cast on this collection of wistful sexual encounters.
title: Lips Together – Six Feet Apart
